duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage day-to-day operations of the Risk Management team.
Document, map, identify risks and controls, and test processes.
Champion process management mindset to support effective risk management.
Collaborate with cross-functional partners to outline processes and associated risks.
Enable prioritization of process management activity across business units through a risk-based lens.
Actively manage and evaluate risk and customer-impacting issues within the day-to-day role.
Demonstrate strong interpersonal and communication skills.
Ability to prioritize and manage time effectively.
Proven track record to manage deliverables timely.
Bachelor's degree in Business or related field with experience in Risk Management, Continuous Improvement, Strategic Change Management, Training, Development, or related field.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business or related field with experience in Risk Management, Continuous Improvement, Strategic Change Management, Training, Development, or related field.
